enable-guns.description: Toggles whether guns should be allowed in the game

enable-drills.description: Toggles whether drills should be allowed in the game

enable-axes.description: Toggles whether throwing axes should be allowed in the game

chunk-size.description: Size of the chunk (in blocks) that should be stored together.

mine-limit.description: The max amount of blocks that can be mined before resetting.

lotto-chance.description: The chance of a lotto block spawning.

admins.description: All the administrators that have access to commands.

autosave-interval.description: This is the time (in-minutes) that playerstats are saved to the store
